title: What are the best online courses for working from home job? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, the main advantage of working from home is by doing something you already know or that which requires less investment in learning or setting up! Having decided to work from home, start with something you are already an expert or very good at. It can be anything - cooking, singing, dancing, teaching, baby care, babysitting, dog-walking, gardening, etc If you are educated and are good at some specific skill, then choose to do that activity from home. There are lots of companies looking for those willing to work part-time/work from home. If you want specific advice on your career choice, write to me and I’m happy to help. Just remember to upvote my answer!

What I’ve been getting into lately is teaching English online. To do this, I got an additional specialized TEFL certification for teaching online. You can take a TEFL course online as well, get certified and then start teaching English online immediately. If you enjoy teaching and are fluent in English, this might be a great career for working from home.
